definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: This course is an elective course for graduate students in School of Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本課程是機械與動力工程學院研究生的一門選修課。

sentences.english: In the school of foreign languages, several advanced options are offered for students in their junior or senior years.
sentences.chinese: 外語學院爲大三和大四的學生開設了高級選修課。

sentences.english: These last from four to six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 選修課學程爲四到六週時間。

sentences.english: The optional course of the specialty is an important part in the curriculum of the higher learning institutions.
sentences.chinese: 專業選修課是高等師範院校課程設置的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Elective courses include project or thesis upon approval by the advisor.
sentences.chinese: 選修課還包括有指導教授的課題研究及論文課程。

definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2

definition: East China University of Science and Technology
pinyin: Hua2 dong1 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: student of a senior high school
(at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
